document.full_text: a german court convicted john demjanjuk on thursday for his role in the killing of 28,000 jews in the sobibor nazi death camp, then set the 91-year-old free because of his age.
document.title: german court convicts then frees nazi guard demjanjuk
lines_and_colors: a german court convicted john demjanjuk on thursday for his role in the killing of 28,000 jews in the sobibor nazi death camp, then set the 91-year-old free because of his age.
